text: Everardo Hegewisch (born 23 July 1961) is a Mexican equestrian. He competed in the team jumping event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Mexico Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Everardo Hegewisch
